Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on social media are buzzing about the upcoming Australian budget for 2023. Both the @AlboMP @AustralianLabor government and the opposition party are talking about their plans to manage the country's finances responsibly and support the cost of living while investing in the future. In Queensland the government plans to increase the rebate for power bills. Everyone seems to have an opinion on these issues and are eager to see how things will play out. #auspol #ausecon #budget2023
